Uses of Package
org.glassfish.hk2.configuration.persistence.properties

  • Packages that use org.glassfish.hk2.configuration.persistence.properties 
    Package Description
    org.glassfish.hk2.configuration.persistence.properties  
    org.glassfish.hk2.configuration.persistence.properties.internal  
  • Classes in org.glassfish.hk2.configuration.persistence.properties used by org.glassfish.hk2.configuration.persistence.properties 
    Class and Description
    PropertyFileBean
    This bean configures the PropertyFileService itself.
    PropertyFileHandle
    This handle is used to read property files and put the values into the HK2 configuration hub.
  • Classes in org.glassfish.hk2.configuration.persistence.properties used by org.glassfish.hk2.configuration.persistence.properties.internal 
    Class and Description
    PropertyFileBean
    This bean configures the PropertyFileService itself.
    PropertyFileHandle
    This handle is used to read property files and put the values into the HK2 configuration hub.
    PropertyFileService
    This service will read a java property file and add its contents to the HK2 configuration hub.
